sentence.Network_en: He had to extemporize because he had forgotten to bring his notes.
sentence.Network_cn: 他因为忘了带讲稿,只好即席发言.

PerfectNetExp.abs: “即”字的... ... 即夕[ at that night] 即席发言[ extemporize;speak impromptu;make an extemporaneous speech] 即行[ expedite].
extemporaneous 即席,临时作成的extemporize 即席演说,即席作曲extend 延长
SAT填空解析14（13-15）_元哲_新浪博客 ... rehearse 排练； extemporize 即兴创作； bungle 拙劣的做；.
extempore〔拉〕即兴的。extemporize〔英〕即兴演奏。extravagantly〔英〕古怪地，狂放地，狂想地。.

list.abs: ...mporization. 这里的宣纸隔一阵要换上新的，因为主人爱好书法的朋友会来贴上自己的即兴之作。4. extemporization n. 即席作成, 即席演说, 即兴之作更多
Inspired by him , Wu drew an extempore mural on the wall of the Tiangong Temple ., 吴道子很受启发 , 即兴在天宫寺墙壁上画了一幅壁画,
an extempore skit ., 即兴小品.
extempore是什么意思... ... Extempore II ： 唱片名 extempore motion ： 临时动议 Extempore Prayer ： 随口祈祷.

entry.def: If you extemporize, you speak, act, or perform something immediately, without rehearsing or preparing it beforehand.

example.ex: He completely departed from the text and extemporized in a very energetic fashion.
example.tran: 他完全脱稿，慷慨激昂地进行即席演说。

means.word_mean: 1. manage in a makeshift way; do with whatever is at hand;

sentences.sentence: "after the hurricane destroyed our house, we had to improvise for weeks"
"he extemporized a speech at the wedding"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =time,表示"时间或时间引起的现象"; 2. = "情绪,回火"

stems_affixes.word_buile: extempore即席的,当场的+aneous……的→即席,当场

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无准备的, 随口说的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tempor时间或时间引起的现象+ary……的→超出时间安排的,没时间准备好
ex出+tempor时间或时间引起的现象+e→超出时间安排的→即席,当场
tempor时间或时间引起的现象+al……的→adj.时间的,世俗的
tempor时间或时间引起的现象+ary……的→有时间性的→临时的
ex出+tempor时间或时间引起的现象+e→超出时间安排的→即席,当场
extempore即席的,当场的+ize表动词→v.即席演说
tempor时间或时间引起的现象+ize……化→时间化→拖延时间

sentences.en: He has to extemporize because he has forgotten to bring his note.
sentences.cn: 他因为忘了带讲稿,只好即席发言。
